text: Exciting to see Walmart Canada leading the charge in expanding healthcare access and affordability! Allowing pharmacists to diagnose and prescribe for minor ailments is a game changer, especially when it comes to reducing strain on our primary care system. It's time for the US to take note - let's prioritize putting patients first and rethink our outdated healthcare regulations! #healthcareforall ğŸ’ŠğŸŒğŸ’ª
